record.field:
route = env['edi.route'].search([('id', '=', env['ir.model.data'].xmlid_to_res_id('edi_af_officer.get_officer_route'))])
record = env['res.partner'].create({'name': 'a'})
vals = { 'name': 'get office msg', 'edi_type': env.ref('edi_af_office.get_office').id, 'model': record._name, 'res_id': record.id, 'route_id': route.id, 'route_type': 'edi_af_get_office', }
message = env['edi.message'].create(vals) message.pack() route.run()
